name: Lost In The Woods (BrownSeededBread)
description:
Your amnesia is worse than it's ever been. You are running out of time. You embark on a treacherous journey through the forest to find the fabled cure to your condition.

This interactive fiction was written in Python, using Curses, for the I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story game jam (https://itch.io/jam/i-cant-write-but-want-to-tell-a-story). 

Controls:

  • [ENTER] - Advance Dialogue / Select
  • [SPACE] - Speed Up Text
  • [ARROW KEYS] - Navigate Options
